definitions: 仕切る[しきる] (v5r, vt) to partition, to divide, to mark off, to itemize,to direct, to take control, to manage, to take responsibility,to settle accounts,to toe the mark
english: Better ask the Captain about this town. He's the one in charge of it.
japanese: この村のことなら艇長に聞いてくれ。ここを[仕切っ]てるのはアイツだからな

definitions: パイロット (n) pilot
english: The Captain was a pilot when Shinra was still interested in their Space Program.
japanese: 艇長は神羅カンパニーがまだ宇宙開発に手を出していたころの[パイロット]さ

definitions: 侍[さむらい] (n) warrior (esp. of military retainers of daimyos in the Edo period), samurai,man in attendance (on a person of high standing), retainer
士[し] (n-suf) man (esp. one who is well-respected),samurai,person (in a certain profession, esp. licensed), member
english: He was going to be the world's first astronaut, but there was an accident…
japanese: 世界初の宇宙飛行[士]になる予定だったのだがま、ちょっとした事故があってな

definitions: 飛び立つ[とびたつ] (v5t, vi) to jump up, to start up, to leap to one's feet, to fly away, to take off
english: Ever since then, he's been wasting his life away here dreaming about going into outer space.
japanese: で、まあ、それ以来ここで宇宙に[飛び立つ]夢を見ながらくすぶってるってわけよ

definitions: 燻る[くすぶる] (v5r, vi) to smoke, to smoulder, to smolder, to sputter,to be sooty, to be smoke-stained,to smoulder (e.g. a dispute), to smolder,to seclude oneself,to live in obscurity, to stay in the same level (of social position, circumstances, etc.)
english: Ever since then, he's been wasting his life away here dreaming about going into outer space.
japanese: で、まあ、それ以来ここで宇宙に飛び立つ夢を見ながら[くすぶっ]てるってわけよ

definitions: 元々[もともと] (adv, adj-no) originally, by nature, from the start
english: This used to be a Shinra base where they used to launch rockets.
japanese: ここは[元々]神羅のロケット打ち上げ基地だったのじゃ

definitions: 基地[きち] (n) base (military, expedition, etc.)
english: This used to be a Shinra base where they used to launch rockets.
japanese: ここは元々神羅のロケット打ち上げ[基地]だったのじゃ

definitions: 傾く[かたむく] (v5k, vi) to incline toward, to slant, to lurch, to heel over, to be disposed to, to trend toward, to be prone to,to go down (sun), to wane, to sink, to decline
english: You saw the leaning rocket, right? That's Shinra No. 26. It never got off the ground though.
japanese: [かたむい]たロケットを見たじゃろ？あれが神羅２６号じゃ。一度も飛んだことはないんじゃが

definitions: 号[ごう] (suf) number, edition, make, model, issue, part of that group,sobriquet, pen-name,suffix attached to names of ships, trains, airplanes, etc.
english: You saw the leaning rocket, right? That's Shinra No. 26. It never got off the ground though.
japanese: かたむいたロケットを見たじゃろ？あれが神羅２６[号]じゃ。一度も飛んだことはないんじゃが

definitions: メカニック (adj-na, n) mechanic
english: Everyone in this town was a mechanic back when they were planning to launch the rocket.
japanese: ここの住人はみんなロケット打ち上げ計画のときの[メカニック]仲間なんだ

definitions: 主導[しゅどう] (n, vs) leadership, initiative, spearhead
english: There was a plan to send a man into outer space. It was headed up by the leader of the Shinra Space Program, Palmer.
japanese: 神羅の宇宙開発部門の長であるパルマーの[主導]で、人間を宇宙におくろうとした計画があったのさ

definitions: 名残[なごり] (n) remains, traces, vestiges, relics,(the sorrow of) parting,end
余波[よは] (n) waves that remain after the wind has subsided,after-effect, aftermath
english: This town is the result of the plan, but the plan got cut…
japanese: でも、その計画も中断しちゃってね……この村は、その計画の[なごり]なのさ

definitions: 上海[シャンハイ] (n) Shanghai (China)
english: Welcome to the Shanghai Inn!
japanese: [上海]亭に、ようこそっす！

definitions: 亭[てい] (suf) arbor, arbour, bower, pavilion,suffix forming the final part of the pseudonyms of some writers and performers,suffix forming the final part of the name of a restaurant
english: Welcome to the Shanghai Inn!
japanese: 上海[亭]に、ようこそっす！

definitions: 台帳[だいちょう] (n) account book, ledger, register
english: Excuse me. Please don't come in here. Our books and the room keys are in here, so I'll have to ask you to please stay out.
japanese: お客さん、困るっすよ。こっちには[台帳]や部屋の鍵とかが置いてあるんで、入ってこないでほしいんすけど

definitions: 鍵[かぎ] (n) key,lock
鍵[けん] (n) key (of a piano, etc.)
english: Excuse me. Please don't come in here. Our books and the room keys are in here, so I'll have to ask you to please stay out.
japanese: お客さん、困るっすよ。こっちには台帳や部屋の[鍵]とかが置いてあるんで、入ってこないでほしいんすけど

definitions: 机[つくえ] (n) desk
月[つき] (n-t) moon,month
突き[つき] (n) thrust, stab, lunge, pass (in fencing),tsuki, [object Object],tsuki, [object Object]
付き[つき] (n, n-suf) furnished with, including,attached to,impression, appearance,luck,sociality,under, assistant (e.g. to a manager),soup base
鴇[とき] (n) Japanese crested ibis (Nipponia nippon), crested ibis
欅[けやき] (n) Japanese zelkova (species of elm-like tree, Zelkowa serrata)
就き[つき] (exp) concerning, per, on account of
坏[つき] (n) shallow bowl
english: Just bad luck, I guess…
japanese: ただ、[ツキ]がなかっただけさ……

definitions: 重圧[じゅうあつ] (n) strong pressure, heavy pressure
english: If he keeps up like that, he's gonna collapse someday. Y'know what I mean? I'm talkin' heart attack.
japanese: そんなふうに心の余裕がないのではいつか倒れてしまいますよ。心の[重圧]にたえかねて、ね

definitions: 安らぎ[やすらぎ] (n, adj-no) peace (of mind), tranquility, tranquillity, serenity
english: A drink will ease your heart…
japanese: １杯の酒はこころの[安らぎ]……

definitions: 錆[さび] (n) rust
寂[さび] (n) patina, antique look,elegant simplicity,well-trained voice
皺[しぼ] (n) bumpy texture of a material (esp. woven fabric),creases in an eboshi hat
サビ (n) hook (high point of a song),(at a sushi shop) wasabi
english: A rusty old rocket… Wonder why they made something so huge?
japanese: [サビ]ついたロケット……何のために、こんな巨大なものが……？

definitions: 彼処[あそこ] (n) there (place physically distant from both speaker and listener), over there, that place, yonder, you-know-where,genitals, private parts, nether regions,that far (something psychologically distant from both speaker and listener), that much, that point
english: It just looms there. That's how the town got its name… Shinra No. 26'.
japanese: [あすこ]にそびえるがこの村の名前の由来宇宙ロケット『神羅２６号』じゃ

definitions: 聳える[そびえる] (v1, vi) to rise, to tower, to soar
english: It just looms there. That's how the town got its name… Shinra No. 26'.
japanese: あすこに[そびえる]がこの村の名前の由来宇宙ロケット『神羅２６号』じゃ

definitions: 由来[ゆらい] (n, vs, adv) origin, source, history, derivation, reason, destiny
english: It just looms there. That's how the town got its name… Shinra No. 26'.
japanese: あすこにそびえるがこの村の名前の[由来]宇宙ロケット『神羅２６号』じゃ

definitions: 一日中[いちにちじゅう] (n, n-adv) all day long, all the day, throughout the day
english: All gramps does is gaze at that rocket all day long.
japanese: ウチのじいさんったら[一日中]ロケットばかりながめておるのぉ

definitions: 原価[げんか] (n) cost price
厳科[げんか] (n) severe punishment, rigorous measures
減価[げんか] (n) price reduction, depreciation, abatement
現価[げんか] (n) current price
現下[げんか] (adj-no) the present time,current
言下[げんか] (n) promptly
弦歌[げんか] (n) singing and (string) music
english: How 'bout it? Want to look at the rocket with me?
japanese: どうじゃ、あんた？わしと一練にロケット見上[げんか]？

definitions: 愛しい[いとしい] (adj-i) lovely, dear, beloved, darling, dearest,pitiable, pitiful
english: My, my precious rocket… It's gone.
japanese: わ、わしの[愛しい]ロケットが……行ってしもうた

definitions: 老人[ろうじん] (n) old person, senior citizen, the aged, the elderly
english: But I just can't stop it. Just call it an old man's folly if you will.
japanese: しかし、あきらめきれんのじゃよ。[老人]のグチと思うて笑ろうてくれ

definitions: ｗ[わら] (n) LOL, haha
english: But I just can't stop it. Just call it an old man's folly if you will.
japanese: しかし、あきらめきれんのじゃよ。老人のグチと思うて[笑]ろうてくれ

definitions: 総員[そういん] (n) the entire strength, all hands, all the members
english: Don't let them get any further! Everyone, ATTACK---!
japanese: ここより一歩も進ませるな！[総員]、突撃ィ～～！

definitions: 突撃[とつげき] (n, vs) assault, charge, attack
english: Don't let them get any further! Everyone, ATTACK---!
japanese: ここより一歩も進ませるな！総員、[突撃]ィ～～！

definitions: わくわく (adv, adv-to, vs) trembling, getting nervous, excited, thrilled
english: Oh, I'm getting excited.
japanese: [わくわく]しちゃう

definitions: スペクタクル (n) spectacle
english: Mmm, a SPECTACLE.
japanese: ん～、[スペクタクル]～

definitions: 叩き出す[たたきだす] (v5s, vt) to begin to strike,to kick out, to forcefully expel, to fire (someone),to hammer (pattern, etc.) into metal
english: I'm outta here, CLOUD! I'm gonna kick those $^%$# Shinra right out of my rocket!
japanese: 行くぜ、CLOUD！神羅のクソッタレ野郎どもをオレ様のロケットから、[たたきだし]てやる！

definitions: アクション (n) action
english: Mmm, here comes some hard action!
japanese: ん～、ハード[アクション]～

definitions: 組む[くむ] (v5m) to cross (legs or arms), to link (arms),to put together, to construct, to assemble, to produce (e.g. TV program),to braid, to plait,to grapple, to wrestle,to unite, to join, to link up, to form an alliance,to set (e.g. type),to issue (e.g. money order)
english: Oh, it's you? I heard you and the Captain really made a BANG!
japanese: ああ、あんたたちか。艇長と[組ん]で、ハデにやったようだね

definitions: カンカン (n) can-can
看貫[かんかん] (n) weighing, platform scales
感官[かんかん] (n) sense organ
カンカン (n, adj-no) extreme anger, fury, rage,intense heat,clanging noise
閑々[かんかん] (adv-to, adj-t) quietly, self-composed
寛緩[かんかん] (adv, adj-t) looking cool and collect, with an air of perfect composure
肝管[かんかん] (n) hepatic duct
漢奸[かんかん] (n) Chinese traitor (esp. a collaborator with the Japanese)
完完[かんかん] (exp) confirmed as completed,everything must go (e.g. in a sale)
english: I also heard that Rufus was so pissed off he went on a rampage and that no one's been able to get near him!
japanese: あの後、ルーファウスは[カンカン]で手がつけられなかったそうだよ。ふふふ、久々にスッとしたよ

definitions: 久々[ひさびさ] (adj-na, adj-no, adv, n) (in a) long time, long time (ago), while (ago), long ago, long while (ago), (in a) long while
english: I also heard that Rufus was so pissed off he went on a rampage and that no one's been able to get near him!
japanese: あの後、ルーファウスはカンカンで手がつけられなかったそうだよ。ふふふ、[久々]にスッとしたよ

definitions: 落ち着く[おちつく] (v5k, vi) to calm down, to compose oneself, to regain presence of mind,to calm down, to settle down, to die down, to become stable, to abate,to settle down (in a location, job, etc.), to settle in,to be settled, to be fixed, to have been reached,to harmonize with, to harmonise with, to match, to suit, to fit,to be unobtrusive, to be quiet, to be subdued
english: I get so restless with the rocket gone. And now that we can see Meteor clearly, …I can't stand it.
japanese: ロケットがなくなってしまったからどうも[落ち着か]ないんだよね。前よりもメテオがはっきりと見えるようになったし……たまんないね

definitions: 密か[ひそか] (adj-na, n) secret, private, surreptitious
english: That sucks. I was secretly eyeing that thing. Broke, huh? What a drag.
japanese: 困っちゃうなぁ。[ひそか]に僕が狙っていたのになぁ。壊れちゃったのかぁ。残念

definitions: ぼろっちい (adj-i) worn-out, crumbling
english: I still can't believe that piece of crap rocket actually made it into space…
japanese: しかし、信じられないよ。あの[ボロっちい]ロケットが宇宙に行ったとはねぇ……

definitions: 押し込める[おしこめる] (v1, vt) to shut up, to imprison
english: Because those Shinra creeps locked us up in our houses, we couldn't even watch the rocket lift off.
japanese: この前、神羅のヤツらが来たときにわしらを家に[おしこめ]てくれたおかげであの日はロケットを見上げられなかったわい

definitions: スポーツカー (n) sports car
english: Mmm. You know that Shinra sports car at CID's house? It might be fun to try and restore that thing…
japanese: う～む。CIDの家にある神羅の[スポーツカー]……あいつをレストアしてみるのもおもしろいかもしれんな……

definitions: ストア (n) store, shop,stoa (classical Greek colonnade or portico),store,Stoic
english: Mmm. You know that Shinra sports car at CID's house? It might be fun to try and restore that thing…
japanese: う～む。CIDの家にある神羅のスポーツカー……あいつをレ[ストア]してみるのもおもしろいかもしれんな……

definitions: 向い[むかい] (n, adj-no) facing, opposite, across the street, other side
english: How long's that guy gonna be in the bathroom? I need to go, too…
japanese: [向かい]の席にすわっていたヤツいつまでトイレに入っているのかな？オレも使いたいのによぉ……

definitions: 引き連れる[ひきつれる] (v1, vt) to take someone along, to be accompanied (by)
english: Seems like Palmer of Shinra, Inc. ordered soldiers to restore the rocket…
japanese: 神羅のパルマーさんが兵士を[引き連れ]てロケットを整備しているようですが……

definitions: 一大[いちだい] (n) one large ..., a great ...
english: Now that one of Shinra's greatest events is over, I guess it's back to the same old boring life again…
japanese: 神羅の[一大]イベントも終わってしまったしまた、つまらない毎日が始まるのね……

definitions: 骨董[こっとう] (n) antique, curio
兀頭[こっとう] (n) bald head,baldness
english: There're tons of what look
japanese: [こっとう]品と言ってもいいような

definitions: オーナー (n) owner
english: …I bet the owner of this store
japanese: ……きっと、この店の[オーナー]は

definitions: マニア (n) enthusiast,mania, enthusiasm
english: was a real gun fanatic.
japanese: かなりのガン[マニア]なのだろう。

definitions: 考えつく[かんがえつく] (v5k, vt) to think of, to come up with
english: Hey CID! I just thought of the best joke! Listen to this one.
japanese: おっ、CID！ついに究極のシャレを[考えつい]たんだ！ぜひ聞いてくれよ

definitions: 駄洒落[だじゃれ] (n) feeble joke, bad pun
english: I'm so sick of hearing these dumb puns, but okay…let's get it over with. Go on…let me hear it.
japanese: おまえの[ダジャレ]は聞きあきたがしかたないから聞いてやる。ホレ、言ってみろ

definitions: のた打ち回る[のたうちまわる] (v5r, vi) to writhe (in pain)
english: …'He's crude an' a jerk'… I mean, He's 'Rude of the Turks'!
japanese: 『みんな、[のたうち回っ]てるど』じゃなくて『神羅のタークスのルード』って奴がきてるぜ

definitions: ブランケット (n) blanket
english: 'Raunchy meat, a pocket full, at the cafeteria'. Uh, I mean… Launch a beat up rocket full of Materia'.
japanese: 『あんたの[ブランケット]にまったりとしたハム』じゃなくてあんたのボロロケットにマテリアボムを積んで打ち上げるつもりらしいぜ

definitions: まったり (adv, adv-to, vs) rich (taste), full-bodied (flavour, flavor), mellow(ness),laid-back (lifestyle), relaxed, comfortable
english: 'Raunchy meat, a pocket full, at the cafeteria'. Uh, I mean… Launch a beat up rocket full of Materia'.
japanese: 『あんたのブランケットに[まったり]としたハム』じゃなくてあんたのボロロケットにマテリアボムを積んで打ち上げるつもりらしいぜ

definitions: ハム (n) ham (cured pig meat),ham (amateur radio enthusiast),hum
鱧[はも] (n) daggertooth pike conger (Muraenesox cinereus),(in Northern Japan) conger eel, garden eel
食む[はむ] (v5m, vt) to eat (fodder, grass, etc.),to receive (a salary), to receive a stipend from one's lord
english: 'Raunchy meat, a pocket full, at the cafeteria'. Uh, I mean… Launch a beat up rocket full of Materia'.
japanese: 『あんたのブランケットにまったりとした[ハム]』じゃなくてあんたのボロロケットにマテリアボムを積んで打ち上げるつもりらしいぜ

definitions: 積む[つむ] (v5m, vt) to pile up, to stack,to load (car, ship, etc.), to pack,to acquire, to accumulate
english: 'Raunchy meat, a pocket full, at the cafeteria'. Uh, I mean… Launch a beat up rocket full of Materia'.
japanese: 『あんたのブランケットにまったりとしたハム』じゃなくてあんたのボロロケットにマテリアボムを[積ん]で打ち上げるつもりらしいぜ

definitions: 低調[ていちょう] (adj-na, n) inactive, slow, sluggish, slack, low tone, undertone, dullness, (market) weakness
丁重[ていちょう] (adj-na, n) polite, courteous, hospitable
低潮[ていちょう] (n) low tide, low water
艇長[ていちょう] (n) skipper (of a boat), coxwain
啼鳥[ていちょう] (n) chirping bird, singing bird
堤頂[ていちょう] (n) crest of dam, top of dam
english: Oh, 'crap-again'(oh, captain).
japanese: いやいやそんな[ていちょう]（艇長）にほめるなよ～

definitions: 遣らかす[やらかす] (v5s, vt) to fail, to blunder, to make a mess, to perpetrate, to do,to drink up, to eat up
english: Looks like that *&%$#^$ Rufus wants to use my rocket for somethin'.
japanese: ルーファウスのボンボン野郎がオレさまのロケットを使って何か[やらかす]つもりらしいな

definitions: 恐る[おそる] (v2r-k, v4r, v2r-s, vi) to fear, to be afraid
english: (A fearful sense of humor…)
japanese: （お、[恐る]べしギャグセンス……）

definitions: ギャグ (n) joke, gag
english: (A fearful sense of humor…)
japanese: （お、恐るべし[ギャグ]センス……）

definitions: キック (n, vs) kick
english: Ugh… Nice kick.
japanese: ぐぅ……ナイス[キック]

definitions: 精進[しょうじん] (n, vs) concentration, diligence, devotion,asceticism, zeal in one's quest for enlightenment,adherence to a vegetarian diet
english: I got to learn more… Devotion, devotion.
japanese: もっと、修行せねば……[精進]、精進

definitions: 鰓[えら] (n) gills, branchia,angle of the mandible, gonial angle
偉[えら] (pref) tremendous, huge
english: ^%$#! Shera. What are you, blind!?
japanese: ケッ！　シ[エラ]よう。どうしてテメエはそんなにどんくせえんだよ！

definitions: 茶[ちゃ] (n, adj-na) tea,tea plant (Camellia sinensis),tea preparation, making tea,brown,mockery
english: We got guests!! GET SOME TEA! ^%$#!
japanese: 客が来たら[茶]くらい出せよな、このウスノロ！

definitions: 炊く[たく] (v5k, vt) to cook (grains, e.g. rice),to boil, to simmer, to stew, to seethe
焚く[たく] (v5k, vt) to burn, to kindle, to light (a fire), to make (a fire),to heat (a bath), to light (a stove), to stoke (a boiler),to use (a camera flash)
卓[たく] (n) table, desk,counter for tables, desks, etc.,offering table before an altar (sometimes used in tea ceremony),tabletop incense burner
宅[たく] (n) house, home,one's husband
柝[たく] (n) wooden clappers (signalling the beginning or end of a performance)
栲[たく] (n) paper mulberry
鐸[たく] (n) duo (ancient Chinese bell with a clapper and a long handle),large wind bell
薫く[たく] (v5k, vt) to burn (usu. incense)
択[たく] (ctr) counter for choices, options, etc.
タク (n) taxi
english: Sheesh!! What bad manners!
japanese: むっか～～！！[たい]ど、悪いわよ

definitions: 狐[きつね] (n) fox (esp. the red fox, Vulpes vulpes),fox (i.e. a sly person),soba or udon topped with deep-fried tofu,light brown, golden brown
吉[きち] (n, adj-no) good fortune (esp. omikuji fortune-telling result), good luck, auspiciousness
english: Man, he sure seems wound up tight.
japanese: なんや、ごっつう[キツ]い人やなぁ～

definitions: 裏庭[うらにわ] (n) rear garden, back yard
english: Shera! I'll be in the backyard tunin' up Tiny Bronco!
japanese: おい、シエラ！オレ様はタイニー・ブロンコを整備しに[裏庭]に行ってるからな！

definitions: 胞衣[えな] (n) afterbirth, placenta
english: He always like this? That's pretty bad!
japanese: いつもだって？そりゃ、ひで[えな]！

definitions: ぶん殴る[ぶんなぐる] (v5r, vt) to knock, to hit hard, to give a hard blow, to wallop, to sock
english: What's his prob!? I'm gonna go clean that guy's clock!!
japanese: なんだよ、それ！？アタシなら[ぶんなぐっ]てやるよ！

definitions: 縮小[しゅくしょう] (n, vs, adj-no) reduction, curtailment
english: After that, the Space Program was cut back and the launch was canceled.
japanese: それ以後、宇宙計画[縮小]が決まってロケット発射は中止になりました

definitions: 太っちょ[ふとっちょ] (n) fat person
english: Well, if it ain't fat man, Palmer. How long were you figurin' on keepin' me waitin'!?
japanese: よう、[ふとっちょ]パルマー。待ってたぜ！

definitions: お茶[おちゃ] (n) tea (usu. green),tea break (at work),tea ceremony
english: Hey-hey! Tea!
japanese: うひょ！　[お茶]だ！

definitions: 砂糖[さとう] (n) sugar
左党[さとう] (n) drinker, wine lover,left (wing), leftist
差等[さとう] (n) gradation
english: Can I have some too? With lotsa sugar and honey and… oh yeah, don't forget the lard!
japanese: わしにもちょうだい。[サトウ]とハチミツたっぷりでラードも入れてね

definitions: 蜂蜜[はちみつ] (n) honey
english: Can I have some too? With lotsa sugar and honey and… oh yeah, don't forget the lard!
japanese: わしにもちょうだい。サトウと[ハチミツ]たっぷりでラードも入れてね

definitions: ラード (n) lard
english: Can I have some too? With lotsa sugar and honey and… oh yeah, don't forget the lard!
japanese: わしにもちょうだい。サトウとハチミツたっぷりで[ラード]も入れてね

definitions: どっさり (adv, adv-to) heaps, a lot, plenty,with a thud
english: With plenty of sugar and honey. Oh yeah, and don't forget the lard, too.
japanese: サトウとハチミツたっぷりでラードも[どっさり]入れてね。うひょひょ！

definitions: お話[おはなし] (n) story, tale
english: I believe Palmer's going to take it. Why don't you talk to him?
japanese: パルマーが持っていくそうです。[お話し]してみたら？

definitions: 見当[けんとう] (n-suf) estimate, guess, conjecture, aim,direction, bearings,registration mark (printing),approximately, about, around
english: We're going after Sephiroth. But seems like we've been going in the wrong direction.
japanese: 我々はセフィロスを追っている。ただ、どうやら今まで[見当]違いの方向を探していたようだ

definitions: 行く先[ゆくさき] (n) destination,whereabouts,future, prospects
english: But now, we think we know where he's headed. But, we have to cross the ocean. That's why we want your plane…
japanese: だが今はだいたい[行く先]がつかめてきたのでな。我々は海を越えなくてはならないんだ。それでお前の飛行機を……

definitions: 何の[なんの] (adj-f) what kind, what sort
english: What d'ya want?
japanese: で、[なんの]用でい？

definitions: 門[もん] (ctr) gate,branch of learning based on the teachings of a single master,division, phylum,counter for cannons
者[もの] (n) person

物[もの] (pref) thing, object, article, stuff, substance,one's things, possessions, property, belongings,things, something, anything, everything, nothing,quality,reason, the way of things,used to emphasize emotion, judgment, etc., used to indicate a common occurrence in the past (after a verb in past tense), used to indicate a general tendency, used to indicate something that should happen,item classified as ..., item related to ..., work of ...,cause of ..., cause for ...,somehow, somewhat, for some reason,really, truly
問[もん] (suf, ctr) counter for questions
紋[もん] (n) (family) crest, coat of arms
文[もん] (n) mon, [object Object],2.4 cm (traditional unit used to measure shoe sizes),letter, character, sentence,scripture, incantation
もの (prt) indicates reason or excuse,indicates dissatisfaction, indicates desire to be pampered or indulged
english: Wow! Not bad for a kid.
japanese: おっ！　若い[モン]にしちゃなかなか感心じゃねえか

definitions: 技術[ぎじゅつ] (n) technology, engineering,technique, skill,art, craft
english: You know Shinra developed a lot of technological gadgets during the meaningless war, right?
japanese: 長くてくだらない戦争中に神羅カンパニーがいろんな[技術]を開発したのは知ってんだろ？

definitions: スカ (n) ska (type of Jamaican music)
すか (n) nonsense,loss (on scratch lottery tickets, etc.)
english: They put a major budget into it and made prototype after prototype! Finally, they completed Shinra No. 26.
japanese: 予算もバカ[スカ]つぎこんで試作、試作、また試作！で、完成したのが、この神羅２６号

definitions: 注ぎ込む[つぎこむ] (v5m, vt) to invest in, to sink money into, to put into, to lay out (funds), to inject, to impregnate, to infuse, to instill, to implant, to imbue, to focus (attention, efforts)
english: They put a major budget into it and made prototype after prototype! Finally, they completed Shinra No. 26.
japanese: 予算もバカスカ[つぎこん]で試作、試作、また試作！で、完成したのが、この神羅２６号

definitions: 世界一[せかいいち] (n-adv, n-t) best in the world
english: They chose the best pilot in Shinra… no, in the world--me. I mean, come on.
japanese: パイロットには神羅一、いや[世界一]のウデを持つオレ様が選ばれた。ま、当然と言えば当然だわな

definitions: 愈[いよいよ] (adv) more and more, all the more, increasingly,at last, finally, beyond doubt,(at the) last moment, worst possible time
english: And finally we get to the day of the launch. Everything was goin' well…
japanese: [いよいよ]迎えた打ち上げの日。何もかも上手くいってた

definitions: 這う[はう] (v5u, vi) to creep, to crawl
ハウ (n) how
english: But, because of that dumb-ass Shera, the launch got messed up. That's why they became so anal!
japanese: ところがあのノロマのシエラのせいで打ち上げ[はお]じゃん。それがケチのつきはじめよ

definitions: 見向く[みむく] (v5k, vi) to look around, to look towards (us)
english: Then, it was all over once they found out Mako energy was profitable. They didn't even so much as look at space exploration.
japanese: 魔晄エネルギーが金になるとわかったらもう終わりだ。宇宙計画なんて誰も[見向き]もしねえ

definitions: 鐘[かね] (n) bell (often a large hanging bell), chime
金[かね] (n) money,metal
お歯黒[おはぐろ] (n) tooth blackening,tooth-blackening dye
鉦[かね] (n) gong, handbell
かね (prt) interrogative sentence-ending particle expressing doubt
矩[かね] (n) carpenter's square,perpendicularity, straightness,model, standard
カネ (n) money (esp. dirty money), loot, hardtack, dough
english: Money, moola, dinero! My dream was just a financial number for them!
japanese: かね、金、[カネ]だぁ？オレ様の夢をソロバンかんじょうだけでぼうにふるない！

definitions: 算盤[そろばん] (n) abacus
english: Money, moola, dinero! My dream was just a financial number for them!
japanese: かね、金、カネだぁ？オレ様の夢を[ソロバン]かんじょうだけでぼうにふるない！

definitions: 日日[ひにち] (n) the number of days, date
english: Everyday, it tilts a little bit more.
japanese: いまじゃ、毎[日にち]ょこっとずつかたむいてらあ

definitions: 血塗る[ちぬる] (v5r, vi) to smear with blood, to kill
english: At this rate, I don't know which'll be first, this thing falling over or me gettin' outta here.
japanese: このぶんだとコイツが倒れるのが先かオレ様がおっ[ちぬ]のが先かってくらいだ……

definitions: チゲ (n) Korean stew, Korean hot pot
english: Yeah! It must be news about restarting the Space Program.
japanese: おう！　きっとよ、宇宙計画が再開されるって話に[ちげ]えねえ

definitions: 適当[てきとう] (adj-na, n) suitable, proper, appropriate, adequate, fit,noncommittal, vague, equivocal, unserious, irresponsible
english: Ummm… Just look around.
japanese: ん～、そのへん[適当]に見て回ってな

definitions: 亀[かめ] (n) tortoise, turtle,heavy drinker,turtle crest, turtle mon
甕[かめ] (n) earthenware pot
カメヤ (n) Western dog
english: Hey! Get your ass in gear! You work like a snail!
japanese: おら、そんな[カメ]みたいにちんたら仕事してるんじゃねえよ

definitions: 待ちくたびれる[まちくたびれる] (v1) to get tired of waiting
english: Even the moon'd get tired waitin' around for your ass!
japanese: お月さんが[まちくたびれ]てそっぽ向いちまうぜ！

definitions: 外方[そっぽ] (n) the other way
english: Even the moon'd get tired waitin' around for your ass!
japanese: お月さんがまちくたびれて[そっぽ]向いちまうぜ！

definitions: ボンベ (n) compressed gas cylinder
english: Don't take so much time checkin' that *%$^# oxygen tank!
japanese: そんな酸素[ボンベ]なんかをいつまでもガチャガチャチェックしてんじゃねえよ！

definitions: ガチャガチャ (n) clatter, clank, rattling,capsule toy vending machine
english: Don't take so much time checkin' that *%$^# oxygen tank!
japanese: そんな酸素ボンベなんかをいつまでも[ガチャガチャ]チェックしてんじゃねえよ！

definitions: 天地[てんち] (n) heaven and earth, the universe, nature, top and bottom, realm, sphere, world,top and bottom,gods of heaven and earth
english: That thing wouldn't break even if hell froze over.
japanese: そんなもん、[天地]がひっくり返ったって壊れやしねえんだから

definitions: ひっくり返る[ひっくりかえる] (v5r, vi) to be overturned, to be reversed, to turn over, to capsize,to fall down, to tumble down, to topple over, to lie on one's back
english: That thing wouldn't break even if hell froze over.
japanese: そんなもん、天地が[ひっくり返っ]たって壊れやしねえんだから

definitions: 糸瓜[へちま] (n) sponge gourd (Luffa aegyptiaca), Egyptian cucumber, Vietnamese luffa, dishrag gourd,loofah, loofa, vegetable sponge,something useless
english: No buts!!
japanese: でもも[ヘチマ]もねえ！！

definitions: 手際[てぎわ] (n) performance, execution, skill, dexterity, tact
english: You're not stupid, so be more efficient!
japanese: おめぇはバカじゃねぇんだからもちっと、[手ぎわ]よくやれよ

definitions: 計器[けいき] (n) meter, gauge
english: Instrument panel…all clear. Shinra No. 26, ready for launch.
japanese: [計器]オールクリア。神羅２６号、発射準備よし

definitions: 管制[かんせい] (n, vs) control
english: Control
japanese: [管制]官

definitions: カウントダウン (n) countdown
english: Engine pressure rising. Shinra No. 26, 3 minutes to launch. Beginning countdown.
japanese: エンジン圧力上昇中。神羅２６号、発射３分前。[カウントダウン]開始

definitions: 起こる[おこる] (v5r, vi) to occur, to happen
english: What the? What happened!?
japanese: な、なんだ？　何が[起っ]た！？

definitions: 船内[せんない] (n, adj-no) on-board ship, inboard
english: A mechanic is still in the engine section of the rocket!
japanese: まだ[船内]のエンジン部にメカニックが残っています！

definitions: 音声[おんせい] (n) voice, speech, sound of a voice,sound (e.g. of a TV)
english: I don't know. Activating the intercom in the engine section.
japanese: わかりません。エンジン部と[音声]つなぎます！

definitions: 繋ぐ[つなぐ] (v5g, vt) to connect, to link together,to tie, to fasten, to restrain,to maintain, to preserve, to keep,to transfer (phone call), to put a person through,to hedge, to buy or sell forward
綱具[つなぐ] (n) rigging
english: I don't know. Activating the intercom in the engine section.
japanese: わかりません。エンジン部と音声[つなぎ]ます！

definitions: 満足[まんぞく] (adj-na, n) satisfaction, contentment, complacency,sufficient, enough, adequate, proper
english: I was still concerned. The results of the oxygen tank test weren't satisfactory.
japanese: どうしても心配だったんです。酸素ボンベのテストで[満足]いく結果がえられなくて

definitions: うんこ (n, vs) poop, faeces, feces
english: It's gonna get so hot in there that there ain't gonna be #$!% left when we blast off!
japanese: そこはなあ、打ち上げのとき[うんこ]ッカスも残んねぇほどバカ熱くなるんだ！

definitions: 一瞬[いっしゅん] (n, n-adv, n-t) instant, moment, for an instant
english: You're gonna be burnt to a crisp! You're gonna die! You know that, doncha!?
japanese: そんなとこにいたら[一瞬]で黒コゲだぞ！おまえ、死んじまうんだぞ。わかってんのか！

definitions: 治る[なおる] (v5r, vi) to be cured, to get well, to be healed,to get mended, to be repaired, to be fixed
english: If I can just fix this, the launch will be a success. I'm almost done.
japanese: これさえ[直れ]ばロケットは打ち上げできるんです。もう少しで終わりますから

definitions: 間に合う[まにあう] (v5u, vi) to be in time for,to serve (suit, meet) the purpose, to be good enough, to be enough
english: CID, We must start the countdown. We won't make it if we don't!
japanese: CID、カウントダウン開始だ。もう、[間に合わ]ない！

definitions: ヶ月[かげつ] (ctr) months (period of)
english: What are you going to do, CID? If we cancel now, it'll be another six months until the next launch!
japanese: どうするCID？ここで中止すれば、次の打ち上げまで６[ケ月]もかかっちまうぞ！

definitions: 始動[しどう] (n, vs) starting (machine, engine, car, etc.), activation
english: Starting engine!
japanese: エンジン[始動]する！

definitions: 点火[てんか] (n, vs) ignition, lighting, firing, setting off
点火[とぼし] (n) light, lamp
english: Ignite Engine!
japanese: エンジン[点火]！

definitions: 温度[おんど] (n) temperature
english: 15 seconds until ignition. Internal temperature rising.
japanese: エンジン点火まで１５秒。船内[温度]上昇中

definitions: 花[はな] (adj-no) flower, blossom, bloom, petal,cherry blossom,beauty,blooming (esp. of cherry blossoms),ikebana,hanafuda,(the) best,glorious, lovely
鼻[はな] (n) nose
端[はし] (n) end (e.g. of street), tip, point, edge, margin,beginning, start, first,odds and ends, scrap, odd bit, least
洟[はな] (n) snivel, nasal mucus, snot
english: We are so proud to be a part of the launch of Shinra No. 26.
japanese: ボクたちも[ハナ]が高いですよ。この神羅２６号の打ち上げに関われたなんて

definitions: 海苔[のり] (n) nori, laver, [object Object]
糊[のり] (n) paste, glue,clothing starch
乗り[のり] (n) riding, ride,spread (of paints),-seater (e.g. two-seater),(getting into the) mood, (entering into the) spirit, energy, enthusiasm, rhythm, feeling
典[のり] (n) rule, law
english: We're praying for your safety!
japanese: ご無事をおい[のり]しています！

definitions: 訳する[やくする] (vs-s, vt) to translate, to interpret
約する[やくする] (vs-s, vt) to promise,to abridge, to simplify, to shorten,to reduce
english: Come on, Shera…hurry up… You're gonna die…
japanese: シエラ……は[やくしろ]……このままじゃ死んじまうんだぞ……

definitions: マーク (n) mark, symbol, insignia, logo, label, emblem,to mark, to put a mark on,trademark,paying attention to, focusing on, watching, guarding, marking,registering a record (in sport, etc.),Mach (OS kernel)
english: There's a Shinra logo on it. Tiny Bronco… This is cool.
japanese: 神羅の[マーク]がついている。タイニー・ブロンコか……いいな、これ

definitions: 独り占め[ひとりじめ] (n, vs) monopolising, monopolizing, hogging, having all to oneself
english: Shinra always keeps the best things for themselves. Let's take it!
japanese: 神羅はよ、こういう便利な物は絶対に[独り占め]しちまうんだよな。いただいちまおうぜ！

definitions: なら (conj) if, in case, if it is the case that, if it is true that,as for, on the topic of,if that's the case, if so, that being the case,if possible, if circumstances allow
楢[なら] (n) oak (esp. Quercus serrata)
奈良[なら] (n) Nara (city)
english: …If you would like to use it, please ask the Captain. The Captain should be in the rocket.
japanese: ……もしそれが使いたい[なら]艇長に聞いて下さい。艇長はきっとロケットのところにいると思います

definitions: またの名[またのな] (exp, n) alias, another name
english: Nanaki, otherwise known as RED XIII.
japanese: ナナキ、[またの名]をREDXIII

definitions: そわそわ (adv, adv-to, vs) restlessly, nervously, uneasily, in a fidget
english: President Rufus is scheduled to come here. The Captain's been so restless all morning.
japanese: 新社長のルーファウスさんがここへいらっしゃるそうなんです。艇長は朝から[そわそわ]してますわ

definitions: 跳び上がる[とびあがる] (v5r, vi) to spring, to jump up, to fly up, to skip
english: It's taking off.
japanese: [とびあがっ]ちゃうよ

definitions: 落とす[おとす] (v5s, vt) to drop, to lose, to let fall, to shed (light), to cast (one's gaze), to pour in (liquid), to leave behind,to clean off (dirt, makeup, paint, etc.), to remove (e.g. stains or facial hair), to lose, to spend money at a certain place, to omit, to leave out, to secretly let escape,to lose (a match), to reject (an applicant), to fail (a course), to defeat (in an election),to lower (e.g. shoulders or voice), to lessen (e.g. production or body weight), to worsen (quality), to reduce (e.g. rank or popularity), to speak badly of, to make light of, to fall into straitened circumstances,to fall into (e.g. a dilemma or sin), to make one's own, to have one's bid accepted, to force surrender, to take (e.g. an enemy camp or castle), to forcefully convince, to press for a confession, to deal with,to download, to copy from a computer to another medium,to make someone swoon (judo),to finish a story (e.g. with the punch line),to finish (a period, e.g. of fasting)
english: CLOUD!? Don't let 'em get away! Shoot 'em down!
japanese: CLOUD！？逃がすな！　撃ち[おとせ]！

definitions: 尾翼[びよく] (n) tail (of an aircraft), empennage, tail assembly
english: %#^@!! The tail's been hit!
japanese: シィィーット！！[尾翼]がやられてるじゃねえか！

definitions: 不時着[ふじちゃく] (n, vs) emergency landing, forced landing
english: Emergency landing…
japanese: [不時着]か……

definitions: 衝撃[しょうげき] (n, vs, adj-no) shock, impact, crash
english: This's gonna be a big splash. Hold on to your drawers and don't piss in 'em!
japanese: さあ、でっけぇ[衝撃]がくるぜ。チビらねえようにパンツをしっかりおさえてな！

definitions: 押さえる[おさえる] (v1, vt) to pin down, to hold down, to press down,to cover (esp. a part of one's body with one's hand), to clutch (a body part in pain), to press (a body part),to get a hold of, to obtain, to seize, to catch, to arrest,to grasp (a point), to comprehend,to quell, to subdue, to suppress, to repress, to hold back, to check, to curb, to contain

抑える[おさえる] (v1, vt) to keep within limits (e.g. spending), to restrain (e.g. emotions), to control, to curb, to hold in check,to hold back (e.g. an enemy), to check, to curb, to contain, to quell, to subdue, to suppress, to repress
english: This's gonna be a big splash. Hold on to your drawers and don't piss in 'em!
japanese: さあ、でっけぇ衝撃がくるぜ。チビらねえようにパンツをしっかり[おさえ]てな！

definitions: ボート (n) boat, rowing boat
english: Can't we use it as a boat?
japanese: [ボート]のかわりに使えるんじゃないか？

definitions: 産する[さんする] (vs-s, vi, vt) to bear (a child), to be born,to produce, to yield, to be produced, to be yielded
賛する[さんする] (vs-s) to approve, to agree, to assent, to endorse, to support, to back,to inscribe,to praise, to laud
参する[さんする] (vs-s, vi) to participate, to take part, to engage in, to be involved
english: I'm all for it.
japanese: [さんせ]い、よ

definitions: 神殿[しんでん] (n) temple, sacred place, shrine, sanctuary, tabernacle
english: Rufus was goin' after Sephiroth to the Temple of the Ancients.
japanese: ルーファウスのヤツはセフィロスを追って【古代種の[神殿]】に行くってほざいていたが

definitions: ほざく (v5k, vt) to say, to spatter, to prate, to prattle, to babble
english: Rufus was goin' after Sephiroth to the Temple of the Ancients.
japanese: ルーファウスのヤツはセフィロスを追って【古代種の神殿】に行くって[ほざい]ていたが

definitions: 息子[むすこ] (n) son,penis
english: Dunno. That numbskull kid was tellin' me he was headin 'The wrong direction'… so maybe it's off this way?
japanese: さあな。あのクソ[むすこ]は『見当違いの方向』って言ってたからここからかなり離れた所じゃないのか？

definitions: 陸地[りくち] (n, adj-no) land
english: Let's just head for land and get some information. Temple of the Ancients… that name bothers me.
japanese: 情報をとるためにとにかく[陸地]をさがそう。【古代種の神殿】……気になる名前だな……
